title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 647.1 - Credit line mortgage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 647.1 - Credit line mortgage

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 253-b

When a credit line mortgage, as defined in section
641.10
of this Title, is recorded, the taxes described in Part 642 of this Title which
are imposed or authorized to be imposed pursuant to article 11 of the Tax Law, shall be based upon the maximum principal amount which is, or under any
contingency may be, secured by such mortgage at the date of execution or any
time thereafter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
647.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
